description: Update data in a SQL database
name: update

connection.description: Name of <connection> from this pack's configuration that specifies how to connect to a database server.

database.description: Optional override of the database in <connection> (required if <connection> is not specified). Database to connect to, to run querys against.

drivername.description: Optional override of the database_type in <connection> (required if <connection> is not specified). The type of database that is being connected to.

host.description: Optional override of the database host in <connection> (required if <connection> is not specified). Database server to connect to. If not using a default port add that here. ex. host.domain.tld or host.domain.tld:1234

password.description: Optional override of the password in <connection> (required if <connection> is not specified). Password of the specified username

port.description: Port to connect to database on. If Default leave blank

username.description: Optional override of the username in <connection> (required if <connection> is not specified). Username for authentication
